name: Knirnschild, Appellant, v. Pittsburgh Brewing Company

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
parties: Knirnschild, Appellant, v. Pittsburgh Brewing Company.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
This case is affirmed on the able and comprehensive opinion of Judge Henry X. O’Brien, writing for the court below, as reported in 9 Pa. D. & C. 2d 623.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Leroy F. Perry, with him William A. Blair and Griggs, Moreland, Blair & Douglass, for appellant.
MeOook Miller, with him Lawrence P. Monahan, Edwin R. McMillin, II, and Kirkpatrick, Pomeroy, Lockhart & Johnson, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Knirnschild, Appellant, v. Pittsburgh Brewing Company.
November 11, 1957:
Argued October 9,1957.
Before Jones, C. J., Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno, Arnold, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
reargument refused December 11, 1957.
Leroy F. Perry, with him William A. Blair and Griggs, Moreland, Blair & Douglass, for appellant.
MeOook Miller, with him Lawrence P. Monahan, Edwin R. McMillin, II, and Kirkpatrick, Pomeroy, Lockhart & Johnson, for appellee.
